context:
The School of Fashion and Jewellery at George Brown College offers a diverse learning environment for students, providing opportunities to build their careers outside the classroom through design studios, runways, competitions, public events, and unique travel opportunities. Some of these opportunities include the annual THREADS event, access to international competitions and learning abroad, and practical experience through a capstone project running two fashion stores within George Brown College – Uptown and Downtown.

Notable recognitions for George Brown College's School of Fashion and Jewellery include rankings as one of the top 50 fashion schools in the world by Fashionista.com (2022), a hub of fashion education in Canada by World Scholarship Forum (2021), and #1 college for fashion in Canada by CEOWORLD magazine (2021). Students have access to various competitions and opportunities to connect with the industry.

Contact information:
- Email: ask.george@georgebrown.ca
- Phone: 416-415-2000, TTY: 1-877-515-5559
- Social Media Hub: Visit Our Social Media Hub

Additional information:
- Application deadlines, college news, upcoming events, tours, and more: Sign Up Now
- Land acknowledgment: Learn more about our land acknowledgment

Please note that the information contained in this website is subject to change without notice. It should not be viewed as a representation, offer, or warranty. Students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.
